text: The municipality is located in Krapina-Zagorje County in northern Croatia Novi Golubovec is a village and municipality in Krapina-Zagorje County in Croatia. According to the 2011 census, there are 996 inhabitants in the area, absolute majority of which are Croats. ==References== Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Municipalities of Croatia
title: Novi Golubovec
